alert.note: Alert for Ohio; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 11:29AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, NORTHEASTERN SWITZERLAND, EASTERN CARROLL, SOUTHERN KENTON, SOUTHERN BOONE, NORTHWESTERN GRANT, NORTH CENTRAL OWEN AND GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH NOON EDT... At 1129 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Warsaw, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Walton, Rising Sun, Union, Crittenden, Warsaw, Florence, Kentucky Speedway, Glencoe, Sparta, Patriot, Atwood, Richwood, Ryle, Big Bone Lick, Interstate 71 at US Route 127, Waterloo, Steele Bottom, Bracht, Markland and Rabbit Hash. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 54 and 77. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 166 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
